feed.title: blank
feed.subtitle: A simple, whitespace theme for academics. Based on [*folio](https://github.com/bogoli/-folio) design.

entry.title: Receding Horizon Control (RHC) Algorithm
entry.content:
Receding Horizon Control (RHC) Algorithm

Receding Horizon Control (RHC), also known as Model Predictive Control (MPC), is a popular control strategy in which the current control action is obtained by solving an open-loop optimal control problem at each time step. This approach involves predicting the future behavior of the system over a finite horizon and optimizing the control inputs accordingly.

Key Components

  1. Prediction Model: A mathematical model of the system dynamics used to predict future states based on current states and control inputs.
  2. Prediction Horizon: A finite time window over which future states and control inputs are optimized.
  3. Cost Function: An objective function that quantifies the performance of the system over the prediction horizon, typically involving terms for tracking error, control effort, and possibly state and input constraints.
  4. Constraints: Physical or operational constraints on the states and control inputs, such as actuator limits or safety requirements.

Algorithm Steps

  1. Measure or Estimate the Current State: Obtain the current state of the system $x_k$.

  2. Solve the Optimization Problem:

    • Formulate an optimization problem over a finite prediction horizon ( N ). This involves predicting future states (\(x_{k+1}, x_{k+2}, \ldots, x_{k+N}\)) and corresponding control inputs ( \(u_k, u_{k+1}, \ldots, u_{k+N-1}\) ).

    • The objective is to minimize a cost function ( J ) that typically takes the form: \(\sum_{i=k}^{k+N-1} \left( \| x_i - x_{\text{ref}} \|_Q^2 + \| u_i \|_R^2 \right)\) where $x_{\text{ref}}$ is the reference state, and $Q$ and $R$ are weighting matrices.

    • Subject to the system dynamics:

      \(x_{i+1} = f(x_i, u_i)\) and any state and input constraints:

      \[x_i \in \mathcal{X}, \quad u_i \in \mathcal{U}\]

  3. Apply the First Control Input:

    • Implement the first control input $u_k^*$ obtained from the optimization problem.

  4. Recede the Horizon:

    • Move the time index forward by one step, i.e., ($ k \to k+1 $).
    • Repeat the process from step 1 with updated state information.

Benefits

  • Optimal Performance: By solving an optimization problem at each time step, RHC can achieve near-optimal control performance.
  • Explicit Handling of Constraints: Constraints on states and inputs can be directly incorporated into the optimization problem, ensuring that the control actions respect these constraints.
  • Adaptability: The approach can adapt to changes in the system dynamics or the environment, as it recalculates the control actions at each time step.

Example

Consider a simple linear system:

\(x_{k+1} = A x_k + B u_k\) with state ( x ) and control input $u$. The goal is to track a reference trajectory $x_{\text{ref}}$.

  1. Prediction Model: Use the system dynamics to predict future states.

  2. Cost Function: Minimize a cost function over a prediction horizon $N$:

\[\sum_{i=k}^{k+N-1} \left( (x_i - x_{\text{ref}})^T Q (x_i - x_{\text{ref}}) + u_i^T R u_i \right)\]

  1. Solve Optimization: Solve for \(u_k, \ldots, u_{k+N-1}\) subject to the constraints.

  2. Apply Control: Implement the first control input ( \(u_k\) ).

  3. Recede Horizon: Move to the next time step and repeat the process.

Conclusion

Receding Horizon Control is a powerful control strategy that leverages optimization techniques to achieve optimal control performance while explicitly handling constraints. Its ability to adapt to changing conditions and ensure constraint satisfaction makes it suitable for a wide range of applications, including robotics, process control, and automotive systems.

entry.title: Latex QuickNote
entry.content:
通用 LaTeX 数学公式语法手册

MathJax 是一款运行于 Web 浏览器当中的开源 JavaScript 数学Sign渲染引擎，通过它可以方便的在现代 Web 浏览器当中显示数学公式，目前已经能够解析 LaTex、MathML 等标记语言。MathJax 项目发源于 2009 年，目前由 NumFOCUS 基金会主持，并且得到了 MathJax 联盟的支持，该联盟是美国数学协会（AMS）和 工业与应用数学协会（SIAM）的共同合资企业。

LaTeX 是一种高质量的排版格式，可以生成复杂的表格与数学公式，是当前电子与数学出版行业的事实标准。本文以 Pandoc 作为 LaTex 渲染引擎（一款用于标记语言文档转换的命令行工具），分门别类的总结了撰写数学公式所需要经常使用到的 LaTeX 语法，方便写作相关科技类文章时随手查阅。

保留字符

LaTeX 环境中具有特殊含义的保留字符，不能直接使用，必须通过指定的语法实现：

No. Sign LaTeX No. Sign LaTeX
1 \(\#\) \# 6 \(\{\) \{
2 \(\%\) \% 7 \(\}\) \}
3 \(^\wedge\) ^\wedge 8 \(\sim\) \sim
4 \(\&\) \& 9 \( ackslash\) ackslash
5 \(\_\) \_      

希腊字母

No. Sign LaTeX Uppercase letters LaTeX Use var as prefix LaTeX pronun.
1 \(\alpha\) \alpha         /ˈælfə/
2 \( eta\) eta         /ˈbeɪtə/
3 \(\gamma\) \gamma \(\Gamma\) \Gamma \(\varGamma\) \varGamma /ˈɡæmə/
4 \(\delta\) \delta \(\Delta\) \Delta \(\varDelta\) \varDelta /ˈdɛltə/
5 \(\epsilon\) \epsilon     \(\varepsilon\) \varepsilon /ˈɛpsɪlɒn/
6 \(\zeta\) \zeta         /ˈzeɪtə/
7 \(\eta\) \eta         /ˈeɪtə/
8 \( heta\) heta \(\Theta\) \Theta \(\vartheta\)、\(\varTheta\) \vartheta、\varTheta /ˈθiːtə/
9 \(\iota\) \iota         /aɪˈoʊtə/
10 \(\kappa\) \kappa     \(\varkappa\) \varkappa /ˈkæpə/
11 \(\lambda\) \lambda \(\Lambda\) \Lambda \(\varLambda\) \varLambda /ˈlæmdə/
12 \(\mu\) \mu         /mjuː/
13 \( u\) u         /njuː/
14 \(\xi\) \xi \(\Xi\) \Xi \(\varXi\) \varXi /zaɪ, ksaɪ/
15 \(o\) o \(O\) O     /ˈɒmɪkrɒn/
16 \(\pi\) \pi \(\Pi\) \Pi \(\varpi\)、\(\varPi\) \varpi、\varPi /paɪ/
17 \( ho\) ho     \(\varrho\) \varrho /roʊ/
18 \(\sigma\) \sigma \(\Sigma\) \Sigma \(\varsigma\)、\(\varSigma\) \varsigma、\varSigma /ˈsɪɡmə/
19 \( au\) au         /taʊ, tɔː/
20 \(\upsilon\) \upsilon \(\Upsilon\) \Upsilon \(\varUpsilon\) \varUpsilon /ˈʌpsɪlɒn/
21 \(\phi\) \phi \(\Phi\) \Phi \(\varphi\)、\(\varPhi\) \varphi、\varPhi /faɪ/
22 \(\chi\) \chi         /kaɪ/
23 \(\psi\) \psi \(\Psi\) \Psi \(\varPsi\) \varPsi /psaɪ/
24 \(\omega\) \omega \(\Omega\) \Omega \(\varOmega\) \varOmega /oʊˈmeɪɡə/
25 \(\digamma\) \digamma         /daɪ’gæmə/

希伯来字母

No. Sign LaTeX 英文 No. Sign LaTeX 英文
1 \(\aleph\) \aleph aleph 3 \(\gimel\) \gimel gimel
2 \( eth\) eth beth 4 \(\daleth\) \daleth daleth

二元运算符

No. Sign LaTeX No. Sign LaTeX
1 \(+\) + 20 \( ullet\) ullet
2 \(-\) - 21 \(\oplus\) \oplus
3 \( imes\) imes 22 \(\ominus\) \ominus
4 \(\div\) \div 23 \(\odot\) \odot
5 \(\pm\) \pm 24 \(\oslash\) \oslash
6 \(\mp\) \mp 25 \(\otimes\) \otimes
7 \( riangleleft\) riangleleft 26 \( igcirc\) igcirc
8 \( riangleright\) riangleright 27 \(\diamond\) \diamond
9 \(\cdot\) \cdot 28 \(\uplus\) \uplus
10 \(\setminus\) \setminus 29 \( igtriangleup\) igtriangleup
11 \(\star\) \star 30 \( igtriangledown\) igtriangledown
12 \(\ast\) \ast 31 \(\lhd\) \lhd
13 \(\cup\) \cup 32 \( hd\) hd
14 \(\cap\) \cap 33 \(\unlhd\) \unlhd
15 \(\sqcup\) \sqcup 34 \(\unrhd\) \unrhd
16 \(\sqcap\) \sqcap 35 \(\amalg\) \amalg
17 \(\vee\) \vee 36 \(\wr\) \wr
18 \(\wedge\) \wedge 37 \(\dagger\) \dagger
19 \(\circ\) \circ 38 \(\ddagger\) \ddagger

二元关系符

No. Sign LaTeX No. Sign LaTeX
1 \(=\) = 49 \(\gneq\) \gneq
2 \( e\) e 50 \(\geqq\) \geqq
3 \( eq\) eq 51 \( geq\) geq
4 \(\equiv\) \equiv 52 \( geqq\) geqq
5 \( ot\equiv\) ot\equiv 53 \(\gneqq\) \gneqq
6 \(\doteq\) \doteq 54 \(\gvertneqq\) \gvertneqq
7 \(\doteqdot\) \doteqdot 55 \(\lessgtr\) \lessgtr
8 \(\overset{\underset{\mathrm{def}}{}}{=}\) \overset{\underset{\mathrm{def}}{}}{=} 56 \(\lesseqgtr\) \lesseqgtr
9 \(:=\) := 57 \(\lesseqqgtr\) \lesseqqgtr
10 \(\sim\) \sim 58 \(\gtrless\) \gtrless
11 \( sim\) sim 59 \(\gtreqless\) \gtreqless
12 \( acksim\) acksim 60 \(\gtreqqless\) \gtreqqless
13 \( hicksim\) hicksim 61 \(\leqslant\) \leqslant
14 \(\simeq\) \simeq 62 \( leqslant\) leqslant
15 \( acksimeq\) acksimeq 63 \(\eqslantless\) \eqslantless
16 \(\eqsim\) \eqsim 64 \(\geqslant\) \geqslant
17 \(\cong\) \cong 65 \( geqslant\) geqslant
18 \( cong\) cong 66 \(\eqslantgtr\) \eqslantgtr
19 \(\approx\) \approx 67 \(\lesssim\) \lesssim
20 \( hickapprox\) hickapprox 68 \(\lnsim\) \lnsim
21 \(\approxeq\) \approxeq 69 \(\lessapprox\) \lessapprox
22 \(\asymp\) \asymp 70 \(\lnapprox\) \lnapprox
23 \(\propto\) \propto 71 \(\gtrsim\) \gtrsim
24 \(\varpropto\) \varpropto 72 \(\gnsim\) \gnsim
25 \(<\) < 73 \(\gtrapprox\) \gtrapprox
26 \( less\) less 74 \(\gnapprox\) \gnapprox
27 \(\ll\) \ll 75 \(\prec\) \prec
28 \( ot\ll\) ot\ll 76 \( prec\) prec
29 \(\lll\) \lll 77 \(\preceq\) \preceq
30 \( ot\lll\) ot\lll 78 \( preceq\) preceq
31 \(\lessdot\) \lessdot 79 \(\precneqq\) \precneqq
32 \(>\) > 80 \(\succ\) \succ
33 \( gtr\) gtr 81 \( succ\) succ
34 \(\gg\) \gg 82 \(\succeq\) \succeq
35 \( ot\gg\) ot\gg 83 \( succeq\) succeq
36 \(\ggg\) \ggg 84 \(\succneqq\) \succneqq
37 \( ot\ggg\) ot\ggg 85 \(\preccurlyeq\) \preccurlyeq
38 \(\gtrdot\) \gtrdot 86 \(\curlyeqprec\) \curlyeqprec
39 \(\le\) \le 87 \(\succcurlyeq\) \succcurlyeq
40 \(\leq\) \leq 88 \(\curlyeqsucc\) \curlyeqsucc
41 \(\lneq\) \lneq 89 \(\precsim\) \precsim
42 \(\leqq\) \leqq 90 \(\precnsim\) \precnsim
43 \( leq\) leq 91 \(\precapprox\) \precapprox
44 \( leqq\) leqq 92 \(\precnapprox\) \precnapprox
45 \(\lneqq\) \lneqq 93 \(\succsim\) \succsim
46 \(\lvertneqq\) \lvertneqq 94 \(\succnsim\) \succnsim
47 \(\ge\) \ge 95 \(\succapprox\) \succapprox
48 \(\geq\) \geq 96 \(\succnapprox\) \succnapprox

几何Sign

No. Sign LaTeX No. Sign LaTeX
1 \(\parallel\) \parallel 14 \(\lozenge\) \lozenge
2 \( parallel\) parallel 15 \( lacklozenge\) lacklozenge
3 \(\shortparallel\) \shortparallel 16 \( igstar\) igstar
4 \( shortparallel\) shortparallel 17 \( igcirc\) igcirc

6 \(\angle\) \angle 19 \( igtriangleup\) igtriangleup
7 \(\sphericalangle\) \sphericalangle 20 \( igtriangledown\) igtriangledown
8 \(\measuredangle\) \measuredangle 21 \(\vartriangle\) \vartriangle
9 \(45^\circ\) 45^\circ 22 \( riangledown\) riangledown
10 \(\Box\) \Box 23 \( lacktriangle\) lacktriangle
11 \( lacksquare\) lacksquare 24 \( lacktriangledown\) lacktriangledown
12 \(\diamond\) \diamond 25 \( lacktriangleleft\) lacktriangleleft
13 \(\Diamond \lozenge\) \Diamond \lozenge 26 \( lacktriangleright\) lacktriangleright

逻辑Sign

No. Sign LaTeX No. Sign LaTeX
1 \( orall\) orall 20 \( eg\) eg
2 \(\exists\) \exists 21 \( ot\operatorname{R}\) ot\operatorname{R}
3 \( exists\) exists 22 \( ot\) ot
4 \( herefore\) herefore 23 \( op\) op
5 \( ecause\) ecause 24 \(\vdash\) \vdash
6 \(\And\) \And 25 \(\dashv\) \dashv
7 \(\lor\) \lor 26 \(\vDash\) \vDash
8 \(\vee\) \vee 27 \(\Vdash\) \Vdash
9 \(\curlyvee\) \curlyvee 28 \(\models\) \models
10 \( igvee\) igvee 29 \(\Vvdash\) \Vvdash
11 \(\land\) \land 30 \( vdash\) vdash
12 \(\wedge\) \wedge 31 \( Vdash\) Vdash
13 \(\curlywedge\) \curlywedge 32 \( vDash\) vDash
14 \( igwedge\) igwedge 33 \( VDash\) VDash
15 \( ar{q}\) ar{q} 34 \(\ulcorner\) \ulcorner
16 \( ar{abc}\) ar{abc} 35 \(\urcorner\) \urcorner
17 \(\overline{q}\) \overline{q} 36 \(\llcorner\) \llcorner
18 \(\overline{abc}\) \overline{abc} 37 \(\lrcorner\) \lrcorner
19 \(\lnot\) \lnot      

集合Sign

No. Sign LaTeX No. Sign LaTeX
1 \(\{ \}\) \{ \} 23 \(\sqsubset\) \sqsubset
2 \(\emptyset\) \emptyset 24 \(\supset\) \supset
3 \(\varnothing\) \varnothing 25 \(\Supset\) \Supset
4 \(\in\) \in 26 \(\sqsupset\) \sqsupset
5 \( otin\) otin 27 \(\subseteq\) \subseteq
6 \( i\) i 28 \( subseteq\) subseteq
7 \(\cap\) \cap 29 \(\subsetneq\) \subsetneq
8 \(\Cap\) \Cap 30 \(\varsubsetneq\) \varsubsetneq
9 \(\sqcap\) \sqcap 31 \(\sqsubseteq\) \sqsubseteq
10 \( igcap\) igcap 32 \(\supseteq\) \supseteq
11 \(\cup\) \cup 33 \( supseteq\) supseteq
12 \(\Cup\) \Cup 34 \(\supsetneq\) \supsetneq
13 \(\sqcup\) \sqcup 35 \(\varsupsetneq\) \varsupsetneq
14 \( igcup\) igcup 36 \(\sqsupseteq\) \sqsupseteq
15 \( igsqcup\) igsqcup 37 \(\subseteqq\) \subseteqq
16 \(\uplus\) \uplus 38 \( subseteqq\) subseteqq

18 \(\setminus\) \setminus 40 \(\varsubsetneqq\) \varsubsetneqq
19 \(\smallsetminus\) \smallsetminus 41 \(\supseteqq\) \supseteqq

21 \(\subset\) \subset 43 \(\supsetneqq\) \supsetneqq

箭头Sign

7 \(\Leftarrow\) \Leftarrow 42 \(\upharpoonright\) \upharpoonright
8 \( Leftarrow\) Leftarrow 43 \(\downharpoonleft\) \downharpoonleft
9 \(\Longleftarrow\) \Longleftarrow 44 \(\downharpoonright\) \downharpoonright
10 \(\Leftrightarrow\) \Leftrightarrow 45 \( ightleftharpoons\) ightleftharpoons
11 \( Leftrightarrow\) Leftrightarrow 46 \(\leftrightharpoons\) \leftrightharpoons
12 \(\Longleftrightarrow\) \Longleftrightarrow 47 \(\curvearrowleft\) \curvearrowleft
13 \(\iff\) \iff 48 \(\circlearrowleft\) \circlearrowleft
14 \(\Uparrow\) \Uparrow 49 \(\Lsh\) \Lsh
15 \(\Downarrow\) \Downarrow 50 \(\upuparrows\) \upuparrows

33 \( warrow\) warrow 68 \( woheadrightarrow\) woheadrightarrow
34 \(\searrow\) \searrow 69 \( woheadleftarrow\) woheadleftarrow
35 \(\mapsto\) \mapsto      

特殊Sign

No. Sign LaTeX No. Sign LaTeX
1 \(\infty\) \infty 33 \( lat\) lat
2 \(\aleph\) \aleph 34 \( atural\) atural
3 \(\complement\) \complement 35 \(\sharp\) \sharp
4 \( ackepsilon\) ackepsilon 36 \(\diagup\) \diagup
5 \(\eth\) \eth 37 \(\diagdown\) \diagdown
6 \(\Finv\) \Finv 38 \(\centerdot\) \centerdot

10 \(\jmath\) \jmath 42 \( ightthreetimes\) ightthreetimes

12 \(\ell\) \ell 44 \(\circeq\) \circeq
13 \(\mho\) \mho 45 \( riangleq\) riangleq
14 \(\wp\) \wp 46 \( umpeq\) umpeq
15 \(\Re\) \Re 47 \(\Bumpeq\) \Bumpeq
16 \(\circledS\) \circledS 48 \(\doteqdot\) \doteqdot
17 \(\amalg\) \amalg 49 \( isingdotseq\) isingdotseq
18 \(\%\) \% 50 \( allingdotseq\) allingdotseq
19 \(\dagger\) \dagger 51 \(\intercal\) \intercal
20 \(\ddagger\) \ddagger 52 \( arwedge\) arwedge
21 \(\ldots\) \ldots 53 \(\veebar\) \veebar
22 \(\cdots\) \cdots 54 \(\doublebarwedge\) \doublebarwedge
23 \(\smile\) \smile 55 \( etween\) etween
24 \( rown\) rown 56 \(\pitchfork\) \pitchfork
25 \(\wr\) \wr 57 \(\vartriangleleft\) \vartriangleleft
26 \( riangleleft\) riangleleft 58 \( triangleleft\) triangleleft
27 \( riangleright\) riangleright 59 \(\vartriangleright\) \vartriangleright
28 \(\diamondsuit\) \diamondsuit 60 \( triangleright\) triangleright
29 \(\heartsuit\) \heartsuit 61 \( rianglelefteq\) rianglelefteq
30 \(\clubsuit\) \clubsuit 62 \( trianglelefteq\) trianglelefteq
31 \(\spadesuit\) \spadesuit 63 \( rianglerighteq\) rianglerighteq
32 \(\Game\) \Game 64 \( trianglerighteq\) trianglerighteq

分数

类型 Sign LaTeX
分数 \( rac{2}{4}x=0.5x or {2 \over 4}x=0.5x\) rac{2}{4}x=0.5x or {2 \over 4}x=0.5x
小型分数 \( frac{2}{4}x = 0.5x\) frac{2}{4}x = 0.5x
大型分数    
（不嵌套） \(\dfrac{2}{4} = 0.5 \qquad \dfrac{2}{c + \dfrac{2}{d + \dfrac{2}{4}}} = a\) \dfrac{2}{4} = 0.5 \qquad \dfrac{2}{c + \dfrac{2}{d + \dfrac{2}{4}}} = a
大型分数    
（嵌套） \(\cfrac{2}{c + \cfrac{2}{d + \cfrac{2}{4}}} = a\) \cfrac{2}{c + \cfrac{2}{d + \cfrac{2}{4}}} = a

数值函数

Sign LaTeX
\(\exp_a b = a^b, \exp b = e^b, 10^m\) \exp_a b = a^b, \exp b = e^b, 10^m
\(\ln c, \lg d = \log e, \log_{10} f\) \ln c, \lg d = \log e, \log_{10} f
\(\sin a, \cos b, an c, \cot d, \sec e, \csc f\) \sin a, \cos b, an c, \cot d, \sec e, \csc f
\(\arcsin a, \arccos b, \arctan c\) \arcsin a, \arccos b, \arctan c
\(\operatorname{arccot} d, \operatorname{arcsec} e, \operatorname{arccsc} f\) \operatorname{arccot} d, \operatorname{arcsec} e, \operatorname{arccsc} f
\(\sinh a, \cosh b, anh c, \coth d\) \sinh a, \cosh b, anh c, \coth d
\(\operatorname{sh}k, \operatorname{ch}l, \operatorname{th}m, \operatorname{coth}n\) \operatorname{sh}k, \operatorname{ch}l, \operatorname{th}m, \operatorname{coth}n
\(\operatorname{argsh}o, \operatorname{argch}p, \operatorname{argth}q\) \operatorname{argsh}o, \operatorname{argch}p, \operatorname{argth}q
\(\operatorname{sgn}r, \left\vert s ight\vert\) \operatorname{sgn}r, \left\vert s ight\vert
\(\min(x,y), \max(x,y)\) \min(x,y), \max(x,y)

如果需要使用特殊的函数Sign，那么可以采用 \operatorname{} 命令进行自定义：

Sign LaTeX
\(\operatorname{mydefine}x\) \operatorname{mydefine}x

根式

Sign LaTeX Sign LaTeX
\(\surd\) \surd \(\sqrt[n]{\pi}\) \sqrt[n]{\pi}
\(\sqrt{\pi}\) \sqrt{\pi} \(\sqrt[3]{ rac{x^3+y^3}{2}}\) \sqrt[3]{ rac{x^3+y^3}{2}}*_

微分与导数

Sign LaTeX
\(dt, \mathrm{d}t, \partial t, abla\psi\) dt, \mathrm{d}t, \partial t, abla\psi
\(dy/dx, \mathrm{d}y/\mathrm{d}x, rac{dy}{dx}, rac{\mathrm{d}y}{\mathrm{d}x}, rac{\partial^2}{\partial x_1\partial x_2}y\) dy/dx, \mathrm{d}y/\mathrm{d}x, rac{dy}{dx}, rac{\mathrm{d}y}{\mathrm{d}x}, rac{\partial^2}{\partial x_1\partial x_2}y
\(\prime, ackprime, f^\prime, f’, f’’, f^{(3)}, \dot y, \ddot y\) \prime, ackprime, f^\prime, f', f'', f^{(3)}, \dot y, \ddot y

模运算

Sign LaTeX
\(s_k \equiv 0 \pmod{m}\) s_k \equiv 0 \pmod{m}
\(a mod b\) a mod b
\(\gcd(m, n), \operatorname{lcm}(m, n)\) \gcd(m, n), \operatorname{lcm}(m, n)
\(\mid, mid, \shortmid, shortmid\) \mid, mid, \shortmid, shortmid

极限

Sign LaTeX
\(\lim_{n o \infty}x_n\) \lim_{n o \infty}x_n
\( extstyle \lim_{n o \infty}x_n\) extstyle \lim_{n o \infty}x_n

范围与预测

Sign LaTeX
\(\min x, \max y, \inf s, \sup t\) \min x, \max y, \inf s, \sup t
\(\lim u, \liminf v, \limsup w\) \lim u, \liminf v, \limsup w
\(\dim p, \deg q, \det m, \ker\phi\) \dim p, \deg q, \det m, \ker\phi
\(\Pr j, \hom l, \lVert z Vert, \arg z\) \Pr j, \hom l, \lVert z Vert, \arg z

积分

Sign LaTeX
\(\int\limits_{1}^{3} rac{e^3/x}{x^2}\, dx\) \int\limits_{1}^{3} rac{e^3/x}{x^2}\, dx
\(\int_{1}^{3} rac{e^3/x}{x^2}\, dx\) \int_{1}^{3} rac{e^3/x}{x^2}\, dx
\( extstyle \int\limits_{-N}^{N} e^x dx\) extstyle \int\limits_{-N}^{N} e^x dx
\( extstyle \int_{-N}^{N} e^x dx\) extstyle \int_{-N}^{N} e^x dx
\(\iint\limits_D dx\,dy\) \iint\limits_D dx\,dy
\(\iiint\limits_E dx\,dy\,dz\) \iiint\limits_E dx\,dy\,dz
\(\iiiint\limits_F dx\,dy\,dz\,dt\) \iiiint\limits_F dx\,dy\,dz\,dt
\(\int_{(x,y)\in C} x^3\, dx + 4y^2\,dy\) \int_{(x,y)\in C} x^3\, dx + 4y^2\, dy
\(\oint_{(x,y)\in C} x^3\, dx + 4y^2\,dy\) \oint_{(x,y)\in C} x^3\, dx + 4y^2\, dy

注意：积分Sign采用 \int\_{}^{} 命令调用，双重积分Sign采用 \iint\_{}^{}，以此类推，最高可以支持四重积分。

曲线积分可以使用 \oint 命令调用，但是 MathJax 并不支持该语法，因此在开启了 Unicode 扩展的前提下，可以改为采用 \unicode{} 命令调用：

Sign LaTeX 描述
\(\unicode{8751} \unicode{x222F}_C\) \unicode{8751} \unicode{x222F}_C 曲面积分Sign的 Unicode 码十进制为 8751,十六进制为 x222F；
\(\unicode{8752} \unicode{x2230}_C\) \unicode{8752} \unicode{x2230}_C 三维曲面积分Sign的 Unicode 码十进制为 8752,十六进制为 x2230；
\(\unicode{8753} \unicode{x2231}_c \unicode{8754} \unicode{x2232}_c \unicode{8755} \unicode{x2233}_c\) \unicode{8753} \unicode{x2231}_c \unicode{8754} \unicode{x2232}_c \unicode{8755} \unicode{x2233}_c 其它积分Sign；

自动编号

| 描述 | Sign | LaTeX | | ———————————————————– | ———————————————————— | —– | | 开启 AMS 扩展包的情况下，会在部分环境的多行公式后自动编号； | \[ egin{eqnarray} E = mc^2 \ e^{i\pi}+1=0 \end{eqnarray} \] | |

1
2
3
4
 egin{eqnarray}
E = mc^2 \
e^{i\pi}+1=0
\end{eqnarray}
   
整个公式都不进行编号，可以使用{equation*}、{eqnarray*}环境； \[ egin{eqnarray*} E = mc^2 \ e^{i\pi}+1=0 \end{eqnarray*} \] 
1
2
3
4
 egin{eqnarray*}
E = mc^2 \
e^{i\pi}+1=0
\end{eqnarray*}
   
单个方程不进行编号，可以在指定方程后面添加 onumber命令； \[ egin{eqnarray} E = mc^2 \ e^{i\pi}+1=0 onumber \end{eqnarray} \] 
1

e^{i\pi}+1=0 
onumber
\end{eqnarray}

括号

常用的 ()、[]、{} 括号Sign可以在 LaTeX 环境当中直接进行使用，但是如果处于较大的Sign当中，就应该配合 \left 与 ight 命令来使用：

类型 Sign LaTeX
圆括号、小括号 \(\left ( rac{a}{b} ight )\) \left ( rac{a}{b} ight )
方括号、中括号 \(\left [ rac{a}{b} ight ]\)  
\(\left \lbrack rac{a}{b} ight brack\) \left [ rac{a}{b} ight ]  
\left \lbrack rac{a}{b} ight brack    
花括号、大括号 \(\left \{ rac{a}{b} ight \}\)  
\(\left \lbrace rac{a}{b} ight brace\) \left \{ rac{a}{b} ight \}  
\left \lbrace rac{a}{b} ight brace    
角括号 \(\left \langle rac{a}{b} ight angle\) \left \langle rac{a}{b} ight angle
单竖线和双竖线 \(\left \vert rac{a}{b} ight \vert\)  
\(\left \Vert rac{c}{d} ight \Vert\) \left \vert rac{a}{b} ight \vert  
\left \Vert rac{c}{d} ight \Vert    
取整函数与取顶函数 \(\left \lfloor rac{a}{b} ight floor\)  
\(\left \lceil rac{c}{d} ight ceil\) \left \lfloor rac{a}{b} ight floor  
\left \lceil rac{c}{d} ight ceil    
斜线与反斜线 \(\left / rac{a}{b} ight ackslash\) \left / rac{a}{b} ight ackslash
上下箭头 \(\left \uparrow rac{a}{b} ight \downarrow\)  
\(\left \Uparrow rac{a}{b} ight \Downarrow\)    
\(\left \updownarrow rac{a}{b} ight \Updownarrow\) \left \uparrow rac{a}{b} ight \downarrow  
\left \Uparrow rac{a}{b} ight \Downarrow    
\left \updownarrow rac{a}{b} ight \Updownarrow    
混合括号 \(\left [ 0,1 ight )\)  
\(\left \langle \psi ight \vert\) \left [ 0,1 ight )  
\left \langle \psi ight \vert    
使用\left.和 ight.不显示某侧的括号； \(\left. rac{A}{B} ight \} o X\) \left. rac{A}{B} ight \} o X

注意：在 Markdown 当中使用 LaTeX 时，为了避免语法冲突，花括号 {} 必须采用 \{和\} 进行转义，或者改用 \lbrace 和 brace 的方式；如果是在 Markdown 表格当中使用 LaTeX，则必须采用 \vert 或者 \Vert 代替直接在公式当中书写 | 和 ||。

括号尺寸

Sign LaTeX
\(( igl( \Bigl( iggl( \Biggl( \dots \Biggr] iggr] \Bigr] igr] ]\) ( igl( \Bigl( iggl( \Biggl( \dots \Biggr] iggr] \Bigr] igr] ]
\(\{ igl \{ \Bigl \{ iggl \{ \Biggl \{ \dots \Biggr angle iggr angle \Bigr angle igr angle angle\) \{ igl \{ \Bigl \{ iggl \{ \Biggl \{ \dots \Biggr angle iggr angle \Bigr angle igr angle angle
\(\vert ig \vert \Big \vert igg \vert \Bigg \vert \dots \Bigg \vert igg \vert \Big \vert ig \vert\) \vert ig \vert \Big \vert igg \vert \Bigg \vert \dots \Bigg \vert igg \vert \Big \vert ig \vert
\(\lfloor igl\lfloor \Bigl\lfloor iggl\lfloor \Biggl\lfloor \dots \Biggr ceil iggr ceil \Bigr ceil igr ceil ceil\) \lfloor igl\lfloor \Bigl\lfloor iggl\lfloor \Biggl\lfloor \dots \Biggr ceil iggr ceil \Bigr ceil igr ceil ceil
\(\uparrow ig\uparrow \Big\uparrow igg\uparrow \Bigg\uparrow \dots \Bigg\Downarrow igg\Downarrow \Big\Downarrow ig\Downarrow \Downarrow\) \uparrow ig\uparrow \Big\uparrow igg\uparrow \Bigg\uparrow \dots \Bigg\Downarrow igg\Downarrow \Big\Downarrow ig\Downarrow \Downarrow
\(\updownarrow ig\updownarrow \Big\updownarrow igg\updownarrow \Bigg\updownarrow \dots \Bigg\Updownarrow igg\Updownarrow \Big\Updownarrow ig\Updownarrow \Updownarrow\) \updownarrow ig\updownarrow \Big\updownarrow igg\updownarrow \Bigg\updownarrow \dots \Bigg\Updownarrow igg\Updownarrow \Big\Updownarrow ig\Updownarrow \Updownarrow
\(/ ig/ \Big/ igg/ \Bigg/ \dots \Bigg ackslash igg ackslash \Big ackslash ig ackslash ackslash\) / ig/ \Big/ igg/ \Bigg/ \dots \Bigg ackslash igg ackslash \Big ackslash ig ackslash ackslash

空格与换行

No. Sign LaTeX
双空格 \(a \qquad b\) a \qquad b
单空格 \(a \quad b\) a \quad b
字符空格 \(a\ b\) a\ b
文本模式中的字符空格 \(a ext{ } b\) a ext{ } b
大空格 \(a\;b\) a\;b
小空格 \(a\,b\) a\,b
极小空格 \(ab\) ab
极小空格（用于区分语法） \(a b\) a b
无空格（用于区分多字母变量） \(\mathit{ab}\) \mathit{ab}

MathJax 3.0 取消了单行公式环境下 \ 的强制换行功能，因此强制换行命令 \ 仅能用于 eqnarray、align、array、matrix 等多行环境当中。除此之外，还可以在 \displaylines{} 行显示命令当中使用 \ 强制换行命令：

Sign LaTeX
\(\displaylines{y=1729x \ y=1729-x}\) \displaylines{y=1729x \ y=1729-x}

颜色

编写 LaTeX 的时候，支持将文本、Sign或者背景设置为下面表格当中的各种颜色：

\(\color{Apricot}{Apricot}\) - Apricot\(\color{Emerald}{Emerald}\) - Emerald\(\color{OliveGreen}{OliveGreen}\) - OliveGreen\(\color{RubineRed}{RubineRed}\) - RubineRed
\(\color{Aquamarine}{Aquamarine}\) - Aquamarine\(\color{ForestGreen}{ForestGreen}\) - ForestGreen\(\color{Orange}{Orange}\) - Orange\(\color{Salmon}{Salmon}\) - Salmon

\(\color{Black}{Black}\) - Black\(\color{Goldenrod}{Goldenrod}\) - Goldenrod\(\color{Orchid}{Orchid}\) - Orchid\(\color{Sepia}{Sepia}\) - Sepia
\(\color{Blue}{Blue}\) - Blue\(\color{Gray}{Gray}\) - Gray\(\color{Peach}{Peach}\) - Peach\(\color{SkyBlue}{SkyBlue}\) - SkyBlue
\(\color{BlueGreen}{BlueGreen}\) - BlueGreen\(\color{Green}{Green}\) - Green\(\color{Periwinkle}{Periwinkle}\) - Periwinkle\(\color{SpringGreen}{SpringGreen}\) - SpringGreen
\(\color{Blueviolet}{Blueviolet}\) - Blueviolet\(\color{GreenYellow}{GreenYellow}\) - GreenYellow\(\color{PineGreen}{PineGreen}\) - PineGreen\(\color{Tan}{Tan}\) - Tan
\(\color{BrickRed}{BrickRed}\) - BrickRed\(\color{JungleGreen}{JungleGreen}\) - JungleGreen\(\color{Plum}{Plum}\) - Plum\(\color{TealBlue}{TealBlue}\) - TealBlue
\(\color{Brown}{Brown}\) - Brown\(\color{Lavender}{Lavender}\) - Lavender\(\color{ProcessBlue}{ProcessBlue}\) - ProcessBlue\(\color{Thistle}{Thistle}\) - Thistle
\(\color{BurntOrange}{BurntOrange}\) - BurntOrange\(\color{LimeGreen}{LimeGreen}\) - LimeGreen\(\color{Purple}{Purple}\) - Purple\(\color{Turquoise}{Turquoise}\) - Turquoise
\(\color{CadetBlue}{CadetBlue}\) - CadetBlue\(\color{Magenta}{Magenta}\) - Magenta\(\color{RawSienna}{RawSienna}\) - RawSienna\(\color{Violet}{Violet}\) - Violet
\(\color{CarnationPink}{CarnationPink}\) - CarnationPink\(\color{Mahogany}{Mahogany}\) - Mahogany\(\color{Red}{Red}\) - Red\(\color{VioletRed}{VioletRed}\) - VioletRed
\(\color{CornFlowerBlue}{CornFlowerBlue}\) - CornFlowerBlue\(\color{Melon}{Melon}\) - Melon\(\color{Redviolet}{Redviolet}\) - Redviolet\(\color{WildStrawberry}{WildStrawberry}\) - WildStrawberry
\(\color{Cerulean}{Cerulean}\) - Cerulean\(\color{Maroon}{Maroon}\) - Maroon\(\color{RedOrange}{RedOrange}\) - RedOrange\(\color{white}{white}\) - white
\(\color{Cyan}{Cyan}\) - Cyan\(\color{MidnightBlue}{MidnightBlue}\) - MidnightBlue\(\color{Rhodamine}{Rhodamine}\) - Rhodamine\(\color{Yellow}{Yellow}\) - Yellow
\(\color{Dandelion}{Dandelion}\) - Dandelion\(\color{Mulberry}{Mulberry}\) - Mulberry\(\color{RoyalBlue}{RoyalBlue}\) - RoyalBlue\(\color{YellowGreen}{YellowGreen}\) - YellowGreen
\(\color{DarkOrchid}{DarkOrchid}\) - DarkOrchid\(\color{NavyBlue}{NavyBlue}\) - NavyBlue\(\color{RoyalPurple}{RoyalPurple}\) - RoyalPurple\(\color{YellowOrange}{YellowOrange}\) - YellowOrange

字体颜色

公式当中可以使用 {\color{hues}text} 调用颜色命令，其中 hues 参数为字体颜色，而 text 参数是公式内容：

Sign LaTeX
\({\color{Blue}x^2}+{\color{Orange}2x}-{\color{LimeGreen}1}\) {\color{Blue}x^2}+{\color{Orange}2x}-{\color{LimeGreen}1}

背景颜色

文本环境中可以使用 \colorbox{hues}{text} 来调用背景颜色命令，其中 hues 参数为背景颜色，而 text 参数是公式内容：

Sign LaTeX
\(\colorbox{yellow}{Thistext}\) \colorbox{yellow}{Thistext}

该命令应用于数学环境当中时，需要在第 2 个参数加入 $\displaystyle + 公式$：

Sign LaTeX
\[ \colorbox{yellow}{$\displaystyle rac{a}{b}$} \] \colorbox{yellow}{$\displaystyle rac{a}{b}$}

注意：在 Markdown 内联 LaTeX 公式 $...$ 当中使用 $\displaystyle + 公式$ 语法时将会引发冲突，因此该语法仅用于多行公式 $$...$$。

RGB 颜色

通过使用 \definecolor 命令可以自定义 LaTeX 公式的颜色：

Sign LaTeX
\(\definecolor{mygreen}{RGB}{0,200,0} {\color{mygreen}e^{i \pi} + 1 = 0 }\) \definecolor{mygreen}{RGB}{0,200,0} {\color{mygreen}e^{i \pi} + 1 = 0 }

Sign LaTeX
\(\mathcal{ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ}\) \mathcal{ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ}
\(\mathcal{abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz}\) \mathcal{abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz}
\(\mathcal{0123456789}\) \mathcal{0123456789}

哥特字体

Sign LaTeX
\(\mathfrak{ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ}\) \mathfrak{ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ}
\(\mathfrak{abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz}\) \mathfrak{abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz}
\(\mathfrak{0123456789}\) \mathfrak{0123456789}

小脚本风格

Sign LaTeX
\({\scriptstyle ext{ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ}}\) {\scriptstyle ext{ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ}}
\({\scriptstyle ext{abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz}}\) {\scriptstyle ext{abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz}}
\({\scriptstyle ext{0123456789}}\) {\scriptstyle ext{0123456789}}

字号尺寸

Sign LaTeX
\({ iny abc 极小 tiny}\) { iny abc极小tiny}
\({\scriptsize abc 超小 scriptsize}\) {\scriptsize abc 超小 scriptsize}
\({\small abc 小 small}\) {\small abc 小 small}
\({ ormalsize abc 正常 normal}\) { ormalsize abc 正常 normal}
\({\large abc 大 large}\) {\large abc 大 large}
\({\Large abc 超大 Large}\) {\Large abc 超大 Large}
\({\LARGE abc 特大 LARGE}\) {\LARGE abc 特大 LARGE}
\({\huge abc 巨大 huge}\) {\huge abc 巨大 huge}s
\({\Huge abc 巨无霸 Huge}\) {\Huge abc 巨无霸 Huge}
